subject: Olympic Games (2008)
Swimming
lead_paragraph: When Michael Phelps extended his Olympic accomplishment with a desperate extra lunge in the 100-meter butterfly final, he sealed Milorad Cavic's legacy as well.
snippet: When Michael Phelps extended his Olympic accomplishment with a desperate extra lunge in the 100-meter butterfly final, he sealed Milorad Cavic's legacy as well.
